titles.title: A resolution informing the President of the United States that a quorum of each House is assembled.
A resolution informing the President of the United States that a quorum of each House is assembled.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Provides for notification of the President that a quorum of each House of Congress has assembled.
